# GenAI-Hub
A collection of Jupyter notebooks showcasing the use of Generative AI models, including Large Language Models (LLMs), Vision-Language Models (VLMs), and Diffusion Models



## Models

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED:MODEL-INDEX:START -->

### Index (by model)

* [BEN2](BEN2) — segmentation, HR-seg, DIS
* [CLIP](CLIP) — contrastive, image-features, text-features
* [DepthAnything](DepthAnything) — depth-estimation
* [DepthPro](DepthPro) — depth-estimation
* [DiffDIS](DiffDIS) — segmentation, HR-seg, DIS
* [DPT](DPT) — depth-estimation
* [OVSeg](OVSeg) — segmentation, oopen-vocab segmentation
* [OWL-v2](OWL-v2) — detection, ovd
* [OWL-ViT](OWL-ViT) — detection, ovd
* [SAM](SAM) — segmentation
* [SAM-2](SAM-2) — segmentation
* [SAM-HQ](SAM-HQ) — segmentation
* [SAMRefiner](SAMRefiner) — segmentation, seg-refinement
* [SmolVLM](SmolVLM) — VLM, VQA
* [VGGT](VGGT) — 3D
